column4: anyone have experiences with atheros wlan drivers or restricted drivers?
ive not had an issue getting an atheros card up for a while. madwifi pretty much always works
the restricted device manager lists it as enabled and in use (i /just/ installed ubuntu and dindt do anytrhing to it). still, wlan0 doesn't show up in iwconfig and i don't know what to do about ut
the driver is installed and running, right?
